text:
All the links found on the page:

http://ant.apache.org/manual/base_task_classes.html

... are broken.  Could not find any email to report this to the webmaster, thus this bug report.
creator: hans@deragon.biz

text:
The page says "The links will not work in the online version of this document."
and we really mean it 8-)

We don't have and don't want an online version of our Javadocs, so these
links are broken "intentionally".
creator: bodewig@apache.org
